Posts.EditableText:
I'm offering to host a single QuestNet game on 1.5mb Broadband server, with a max of 30 Players.

Your game has to be completely playable from the moment you submit it, with multiplayer features, and some good content.  All source will be viewed, and games will be tested before accepted.

Remember that only 1 game will get this.  The best multiplayer games wins.

Also, with this offer comes free advertisement, and will be guaranteed to receive immediate online players.

Posts.EditableText: I don't know enough ASL to accomplish this. I work with visual basic, that's all I know. http://www.deloria-online.net - Game I currently program for.
